programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2005 : E07 Superdome - New Orleans, LA - Freestyle
programme.desc: Fans are packed into the Louisiana Superdome for some epic freestyle action on January 15, 2005!

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E04 Golden 1 Center - Sacramento, CA
programme.desc: El Toro Loco’s Elvis Lainez leads the charge as Arena Championship Series West heads to the Golden 1 Center in Sacramento, California. Lainez will need to hold off Earth Shaker’s Tristan England who looks to reclaim the top spot in the series points standings.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E11 Lucas Oil Stadium - Indianapolis, IN
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2010 season continues with racing and freestyle action from Lucas Oil Stadium, on January 30, 2010.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2014 : E08 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA
programme.desc: Check out the racing freestyle action from Angel Stadium on January 10, 2014.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2002 : E17 Alltel Stadium - Jacksonville, FL - Racing
programme.desc: Tonight, rain falls on 10 of the best monster truck drivers during racing excitement at the Alltel Stadium in Jacksonville, Florida.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2017 : E20 MetLife Stadium - East Rutherford, NJ - Freestyle
programme.desc: Day two in East Rutherford continues at MetLife stadium with the freestyle competition.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E19 Mohegan Sun Arena - Wilkes-Barre, PA
programme.desc: Monster Jam heads to the Diamond City as Arena Championship Series East takes over the Mohegan Sun Arena. Grave Digger’s Weston Anderson has clinched the series, but can he keep the event championship from a surging Armando Castro in El Toro Loco? Find out when the east series roars into Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.sub-title: S2013 : E12 Everbank Field - Jacksonville, FL
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2014 season at Everbank Field in Jacksonville, FL featuring Semi Finals race

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2002 : E08 Edward Jones Dome - St. Louis, MO - Freestyle
programme.desc: Hold onto your seats because Monster Jam's 2002 season continues with freestyle action in the Gateway City of St. Louis.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2016 : E14 Levi's Stadium - Santa Clara, CA
programme.desc: Levi's Stadium is soaked from the rain and creates a rather difficult track for the drivers to play on. Watch as the Jammer's skills are put to the test!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2013 : E20 EverBank Field - Jacksonville, FL
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2013 season heats up with all the racing & freestyle fun and action from Everbank Field on February 23, 2013.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2002 : E22 Metrodome - Minneapolis, MN - Freestyle
programme.desc: It's the last regular season Monster Jam in Minneapolis! Tonight, ten drivers compete with their freestyle skills.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2008 : E12 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Freestyle
programme.desc: Monster Jam is back at the sold-out Raymond James Stadium for freestyle action from Tampa, FL, on January 19, 2008.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.sub-title: S2014 : E13 Carrier Dome - Syracuse, NY
programme.desc: Check out the fun at the Carrier Dome in Syracuse, NY during Monster Jam's 2014 season!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2006 : E15 Edward Jones Dome - St. Louis, MO - Racing
programme.desc: A sold out, jam-packed stadium watches on as the stars of Monster Jam compete with racing action from the Edwards Jones Dome on February 25, 2006.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2006 : E09 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Racing
programme.desc: Hang on tight! Monster Jam's 2006 season continues with racing action from Raymond James Stadium, on January 21, 2006.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2009 : E05 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA - Racing
programme.desc: All of your favorite trucks and drivers race into Angel Stadium of Anaheim on January 10, 2009.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E13 Citrus Bowl - Orlando, FL - Racing
programme.desc: Monster Jam races into the Florida Citrus Bowl, on January 30, 2010.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E23 Gillette Stadium - Foxborough, MA
programme.desc: As the points series resumes, Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson looks to clinch the Red series title and secure a spot at World Finals XXII, while Bakugan Dragonoid’s Camden Murphy makes one last stand to stay in the hunt and capture his first series championship.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2016 : E05 NRG Stadium - Houston, TX
programme.desc: The drivers head to Texas to compete for tonight's trophy.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2012 : E13 Citrus Bowl - Orlando, FL - Freestyle
programme.desc: The fun keeps rolling with freestyle action from Orlando Citrus Bowl, on January 28, 2012.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2000 : E06 Georgia Dome - Atlanta, GA - Freestyle
programme.desc: The heat is on in the Georgia Dome as your favorite trucks and drivers fire up the engines and show their style in freestyle action.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2022 : E08 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Monster Jam’s 2022 season continues with round 8 of the Stadium Championship Series, at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, FL.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.sub-title: S2012 : E03 MetLife Stadium - East Rutherford, NJ
programme.desc: Monster Jam's biggest of the best compete at Metlife Stadium on East Rutherford, NJ.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E02 Oracle Park - San Francisco, CA
programme.desc: Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series West kicks off in Oracle Park for the first time in seventeen years. Colt Stephens begins defense of his World Finals Freestyle Championship while Ryan and Adam Anderson compete on the same series for the first time since 2021. It’s Grave Digger vs Son Uva Digger in San Francisco.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2012 : E04 M&T Bank Stadium - Baltimore, MD - Freestyle
programme.desc: Monster Jam freestyle action continues from M&T Bank Stadium, on July 9, 2011.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2004 : E09 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Racing
programme.desc: Monster Trucks invade Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, FL, for another star-studded event.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E06 Metrodome - Minneapolis, MN - Freestyle
programme.desc: Don't miss the freestyle action from the HHH Metrodome, on December 5, 2009.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E30 LoanDepot Park - Miami, FL
programme.desc: The fun continues in Miami, FL as your favorite Monster Jam trucks and drivers show off their motor skills at loanDepot Park.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E22 Gillette Stadium - Foxborough, MA
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East slip-slides its way into Gillette Stadium as Bryce Kenny looks to launch Great Clips Mohawk Warrior to back-to-back freestyle wins, as Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga hopes his competitors don’t rain on his parade to a sixth series title.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E19 EverBank Field - Jacksonville, FL
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East ends its Florida run on a mud filled track in Jacksonville. Tyler Menninga looks to mudslide the momentum from a perfect event in Orlando while Blake Granger rides his International Series success back home in the states as he pilots Max-D.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E14 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East continues its tear through the sunshine state as Tyler Menninga attempts to drive Grave Digger to back-to-back event championships. Meanwhile, Tristan England is undefeated on the Ray-J racetrack and looks to pilot JCB Digatron to a perfect racing record as Monster Jam continues in Tampa.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E21 JMA Wireless Dome - Syracuse, NY
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East rolls into upstate New York as Tyler Menninga attempts to clinch his second straight series title, while JCB Digatron’s Tristan England and Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempt to block Grave Digger from the series win.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2016 : E02 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Next on the list is Raymond James Stadium for the 2016 Monster Jam Championship Series tour.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2021 : E20 Atlanta Motor Speedway - Atlanta, GA
programme.desc: The Monster Jam 2021 Stadium Championship Series continues at Atlanta Motor Speedway in Georgia.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2020 : E02 The Dome at America's Center - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: The 2020 Monster Jam season continues with racing and freestyle action at the Dome at America's Center on January 18, 2020.

programme.desc: Joon Jae wonders why he has a slight sense of deja vu to the mermaid, Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae panics when heard Sim Cheong went to the emergency room but Chi Hyeon says it was just an accident.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae loses his memory of the time he spent with Sim Cheong at Spain. Dong Pyo looks for clues of murder.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae gets confused of his feeling to Sim Cheong. He recalls Yang Seung Gil when ran into Ma Dae Young.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.
